## ğŸ¯ What You Need to Know

Your repository **already has** everything configured for GitHub Pages deployment via GitHub Actions. You just need to enable it in your repository settings.

## âœ… 3-Step Setup (Takes 30 seconds)

### Step 1: Go to Settings
```
https://github.com/bastheboss7/playwright-hybrid-integration-API-UI-A11y/settings/pages
```

### Step 2: Set Source to "GitHub Actions"
- Under **Build and deployment**
- Set **Source** to `GitHub Actions` (NOT "Deploy from a branch")
- Saves automatically

### Step 3: Trigger a Deployment
- Push to `main`, or run workflow manually from Actions tab
